name: gitflow-ai-platform
description: GitFlow AI Analytics Platform - Full-stack Git analytics with ML-powered merge conflict prediction and ROI calculation

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ml-pipeline && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../chrome-extension && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:extension
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ml
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
